author: Jon Greenberg
statement: “We had already issued several thousand Special Immigrant Visas .. to the (Afghan) translators, when I came into office.”

author: Warren Fiske
statement: When Terry McAuliffe was governor, “Unemployment went down in every single county, including rural Virginia by nearly 50%.

author: Louis Jacobson
statement: "The cost of an automobile, it's kind of back to what it was before the pandemic."

author: Louis Jacobson
statement: “Ten thousand people have recently died. 9,950 of them, thereabouts, are people who hadn’t been vaccinated."

author: Amy Sherman
statement: “You’re not going to get COVID if you have these vaccinations.”
